name: Jabbing Style

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Unarmed Strike; base attack bonus +6, brawler's flurry class feature, or flurry of blows class feature.

sections.text: When you hit a target with an unarmed strike and you have hit that target with an unarmed strike previously that round, you deal an extra 1d6 points of damage to that target.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: base attack bonus +6, brawler's flurry class feature, or flurry of blows class feature
description: A cluster of quick strikes deals more damage than a single roundhouse swing.
